body: I Personally think that Avicus should add a new 1v1 minigame, If you think so just post under this discussion saying Agreed.If Not then reply with Disagree.If we get 100 Players to agree maybe the staff could have a look and establish it for us. -WestTidePvP
body_tagged: I Personally think that Avicus should add a new 1v1 minigame, If you think so just post under this discussion saying Agreed.If Not then reply with Disagree.If we get 100 Players to agree maybe the staff could have a look and establish it for us. -WestTidePvP
title: Petition for Avicus to add 1v1's

replies.body:
Disagree.

Pot PvP servers exist for a reason.
replies.body_tagged:
Disagree.

Pot PvP servers exist for a reason.

replies.body: With the fact that avicus can get like 150 people on a weekend, and 90% of those people only play Nebula, I disagree.
replies.body_tagged: With the fact that avicus can get like 150 people on a weekend, and 90% of those people only play Nebula, I disagree.

replies.body: I disagree. We don't need any new gamemodes, and you can just go play on Badlion or Kohi.
replies.body_tagged: I disagree. We don't need any new gamemodes, and you can just go play on Badlion or Kohi.

replies.body: Avicus needs to be unique compared to other servers. Anyway who would play 1v1, everyone is playing Nebula because there are better 1v1 servers. Disagree
replies.body_tagged: Avicus needs to be unique compared to other servers. Anyway who would play 1v1, everyone is playing Nebula because there are better 1v1 servers. Disagree

replies.body: Disagree. It would make Avicus more laggy, as too many servers would be running at the same time, and what Hacktivism said, pvp servers exists for a reason.
replies.body_tagged: Disagree. It would make Avicus more laggy, as too many servers would be running at the same time, and what Hacktivism said, pvp servers exists for a reason.

replies.body:
Disagree.

There is no reason to have it
replies.body_tagged:
Disagree.

There is no reason to have it

replies.body: Thank you for taking the time to stating your opinions, I will now have to close this petition because I don't really think anyone is fond about 1v1's. 6/7 Disagreed
replies.body_tagged: Thank you for taking the time to stating your opinions, I will now have to close this petition because I don't really think anyone is fond about 1v1's. 6/7 Disagreed

If you didn't know, SG servers and soup servers exist ._.
